title: What should I even write if I want to be a blogger? - Quora

response.answer_text: You should write about what you care about. Do you love your career? Why? Write about it and share. Do you have hobbies, interests, etc.? Why do you like them? Write about them, and share. What are you passionate about? Why? Write about that, and share. Do you want to be a force for good in the world? Why? Write about that, and share. Blogging/writing/any pursuit we take on isn’t about getting famous or making a ton of money. It’s not about SEO or ‘likes’ or being perfect, or being an ‘influencer’. (Yuck!) It’s about being an active, engaged person in the world. In YOUR world. It’s about being the best YOU you can be. It’s your way of having a voice. Use it!
